column4: hello people, recently i've been having problems with firefox and probably flash player. youtube will play on negative colors and won't play when the video is embedded. google maps won't work at all (not even scrolling) and some other sites as well. any ideas? ubuntu 11.10, firefox 11
do you have the correct proporietory drivers installed? (using the "additional drivers tool")
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=11801233 - all kinds of explanations and workarounds there, gotta love flash! v_v
